name: Abraham, Martin And John
content: Has anybody here seen my friend Abraham
Can you tell me where he gone
He freed a lot of people
But it seems the good die young
I just looked around and he gone
Has anybody here seen my friend Martin
Can you tell me where he gone
He freed a lot of people
But it seems the good die young
I just looked around and he gone
Has anybody here seen my friend John
Can you tell me where he gone
He freed a lot of people
But it seems the good die young
I just looked around and he gone

Can you tell me where he gone
He freed a lot of people
But it seems the good die young
I just looked around and he gone
